name: Ibex Technologies
tag_list: mobiles-solutions, mobile-apps, smart-tv, iphone, android, windows-phone, windows-8, blackberry
overview:
Ibex Technologies specialises in web, mobile and smart tv solutions for business, including mobile marketing (through SMS, Mailing and QR codes), web and mobile ad-hoc development. Ibex provides a suite of mobility solutions with high quality messaging and connections.

Ibex development team specializes in designing, developing and delivering innovative mobile applications and services to ensure that customers reach the best possible experience, connecting the real world through Be Mobile (www.bemobile.cl).

Ibex mobile area focus on four well defined platforms that have been developed specifically to encourage data use. These platforms are accepted globally and have the built in capabilities to allow for service innovation and include; iPhone, Windows Phone, Blackberry, Android and WebApps

milestones.description: Selected by ProChile, through Contact Chile program, to expand Ibex Technologies all over LatAm
